function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of the IBEM hardware instrument with contagious pathogens or microbes","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases through the hardware instrument to building occupants","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and cleaning of the hardware instrument, as well as proper handling and maintenance protocols","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings for the hardware, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate data security for the extensive IEQ database","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive occupant data and potential breaches of privacy","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust data encryption and access control measures, regular security audits","Technologies":"Encryption algorithms, access control systems","People":"Building occupants, data security specialists","Owner":"Building management, data security specialists"},{"Description":"Inaccurate or misleading IEQ data collection and transmission","Impact":"Mismanagement of building environments based on faulty data, leading to potential health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and maintenance of sensors, real-time data validation and error detection protocols","Technologies":"Sensor calibration tools, real-time data validation software","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, data analysts","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"}]}
